emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Mrs. L. Gardner, Mabel Gordon, Edna Wallace, Rev. C.E. McFadden, Thomas H. Lee, and Mabel Hopkins, gathered around new duplicating machine in Bethany Baptist Church, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 1, 1958, pg. 11 reads: "Inspect Duplicator - The Missionary Society of Bethany Baptist Church recently purchased a duplicating machine, fulfilling the desire of the Rev. Rufus Prunty, a missionary in Africa. The Rev. Mr. Prunty made known his desire on his last furlough from Africa.  Inspecting the machine, left to right, are Mrs. L. Gardner, assistant secretary; Mrs. Mabel Gordon, Mrs. Edna Wallace, president; the Rev. C.E. McFadden, pastor; Thomas H. Lee, chairman of the Deacon Board, and Mrs. Mabel Hopkins. - Harris Photo."
